channel.title: Desktop + Laptop montior???
channel.description: I have a desktop that doesnt have a monitor and i have an unusable laptop that has a fried hard drive. Is there a cable that i could attach my desktop to my laptop, enabling me to use the screen on my laptop as a monitor? If the answer is no, then it cost me more than $100 to remove everything from my desktop and outfit it into my laptop? (excluding the fan).

item.title: Desktop + Laptop montior???
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
shifty:

I have a desktop that doesnt have a monitor and i have an unusable laptop that has a fried hard drive. Is there a cable that i could attach my desktop to my laptop, enabling me to use the screen on my laptop as a monitor?
If the answer is no, then it cost me more than $100 to remove everything from my desktop and outfit it into my laptop? (excluding the fan).

You can’t just take desktop parts out of it and shove them into a laptop. They accept different kinds of parts. Like everyone else has said, either buy a new hard drive or a new monitor instead of pissing around with other solutions.

Read full topic

item.title: Desktop + Laptop montior???
item.dc:creator: Spooboy
item.description:
^ This.

Making a makeshift monitor is kind of silly. Go out and spend the 60-100…I’m sure that if there was a cable, it would cost around that anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Desktop + Laptop montior???
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Well, I have to agree with sersoft, it is defiantly cheaper then 100$ to buy a new hard drive or monitor. Also doing so will yield better results then dicking around with hooking up you laptop to your desktop.

Read full topic

item.title: Desktop + Laptop montior???
item.dc:creator: shifty
item.description:
sersoft:

Buy a new monitor and a new HDD for your laptop. Win/Win.

A double no would have been fine instead of hurting my precious feelings.

Read full topic

item.title: Desktop + Laptop montior???
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Buy a new monitor and a new HDD for your laptop. Win/Win.

A new monitor can be less than 100$ and a new laptop HDD can be way below 100.

Read full topic
